tasks.task_description: Build the React application for production
Configure bucket for static website hosting
Set up public access permissions and bucket policy
Create automated build and deploy script

description: Deploy Quiz Educativo to S3 bucket with proper permissions and automation script
context: Build completed successfully. Generated files in dist/ folder with index.html, CSS and JS assets.
S3 bucket 'quiz-feira-ciencias-gabriel-2025' created successfully in us-east-1 region.
Bucket configured for static website hosting with index.html as both index and error document. Public access enabled with bucket policy for read access.
All built files uploaded successfully to S3 bucket including index.html, CSS, JS assets and vite.svg.
Created deploy.sh script and added npm deploy command to package.json for automated build and deployment.
Website is successfully deployed and accessible. HTTP 200 response confirmed from http://quiz-feira-ciencias-gabriel-2025.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com
